name: Userstyles.org >> Classic & Elegant
description:
Classic version of style style 11488 - Main page's categories aren't changed.

Main Features:
1. Elegant header.
2. Nicer-looking bullets
3. Styles are numbered when looking inside category
4. Styles with average rating 4 - 5 have identifying "star" before it's name.
5. Obsolete styles removed   -  credits go to user 911 and her style style 2924 
6. Screenshots are resized back to it's original size. / thanks to user 838 and his style style 6158 for an idea/. Large screenshots are resized to fit body width.
7. Touch-ups while viewing a style.
8. Three-column display for lists of styles.
_________________
Update Nov 28, 2008: Updated "Post a Review" part of the page.
